message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CR 

The paper deals with the application of deep learning techniques to detect fake news using only their text. This falls under the domain of natural language processing (NLP), which is covered by the cs.CL (Computation and Language) sub-category. Additionally, the use of neural network architectures for this task suggests that the paper could also be classified under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with information retrieval (IR) as it aims to identify relevant information from a large corpus of text. Finally, the potential danger of fake news to destabilize governments suggests that the paper could also be classified under cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
